Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: larry h
Reviews.Content: We purchased this tv so we would have plenty of viewing choices. The picture quality is fantastic. The only item I would improve upon would be the speakers and they are very satisfactory as is plus there are connections for external speakers if so desired. We love this unit!!!!

Reviews.Title: Poor sound quality, average picture quality!
Reviews.Author: Ed Montreuil
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV based on good reviews I read about it, but let me tell you...those good reviews are not accurate.I mounted this TV in my travel trailer and turned it on. My reception signal was good and after allowing the TV to scan and capture all the air channels available, I adjusted the picture quality and the sound quality to their best levels.The picture quality is just barely average...nothing to rave about, but it is the sound quality that really misses the mark. The TV sounds like an old transistor radio, very tinny and shallow. For this reason I cannot recommend this TV as a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Good 12v TV
Reviews.Author: dsctm3
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for a small travel trailer.  Comes with 12v cigarette lighter adapter, works very well with antenna television.

Reviews.Title: 12 volt for my conversion van
Reviews.Author: GiniusTFLord
Reviews.Content: bit noisy when the dvd is running but if the volums up you wont notice it. works great other then that. bought it for my doge conversion van for when we go on trips
